context: You are welcomed into an austere manor by a man named Alphonse. "Thank you for coming. I lead The Silver Coin, a werewolf preservation society. The Howling Twins are besmirching the name of decorous werewolves. We cannot coexist with the citizens of London when so many of our kind are attacking recklessly. You must stop the Howling Twins so that societies like mine can continue our work."
option_text: You point out that werewolves, when properly self-regulated, deserve the same rights as any species. You will attempt to restore honour to the Silver Coin by eliminating the Howling Twins and any other vukasin you come across who cannot control their violent urges.
option_result: Alphonse's eyes brighten. "Thank you citizen. Your efforts shall not go unnoticed. In fact please accept this payment in advance." [Gain 150 Money]

option_text: You insist that your services be rewarded with capital. Alphonse silently considers this.
option_result: Finally he says "All right. I should hope this is enough." [Gain 100 Money]

option_text: You argue that werewolves are dangerous and unpredictable. Claiming that they will never mesh with civilized society, you say you will stop the Howling Twins, but not for Alphonse's benefit.
option_result: There's a flash of silver in Alphonse's eyes before he says "Very well then. I will seek supporters elsewhere." You take your leave never to return.
